question: Which country houses the "Goderdzi Petrified Forest Natural Monument"?
explanation: The Goderdzi Petrified Forest Natural Monument is an IUCN category III natural monument or feature in Georgia. This area is listed as a Natural Monument in the List of Protected Areas of Georgia. Together with the Borjomi Strict Nature Reserve, Borjomi-Kharagauli National Park and Nedzvi Managed Reserve, it is one of four protected areas under the same management authority.
